title: Tong Zhi Zhe
synopsis: A Jack of All Trades is a person who can competently do all kinds of jobs. Loser Zhang Dabao is a professional Jack-of-All-Trades, but his living conditions are, shall we say, less than satisfactory. One day, is approached be a beautiful (and perverted) woman for help. He accepts, and soon embarks on a mission like nothing the world has seen before.
